content: this is a lightweight version of alberta summer that s perfect for sunny days it can be made with any fingering weight yarn or a marled effect can be achieved with two strands of lace weight held together it has a classic t-shirt fit with about 2 inches of positive ease and a hem that hits at mid hip the lace pattern at the yoke is a variation of the one in alberta summer but is more open and has the option to be knit with just a single strand of lace weight yarn for a more delicate effect the orange sample was made with two strand of lace yarn held together and a single strand in the lace at the yoke this is a good project for a beginner sweater knitter as the lace is very simple and there s minimal shaping german short row are used to lower the front neckline
